001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format;
002
003import java.time.ZoneId;
004import java.time.ZoneOffset;
005
006import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProperties;
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.ServiceRegistry;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator;
010
011/**
012 * Pattern Config needed for pattern keywords that is generally platform specific. Through
013 * property configuration there can only be one pattern config but through programmatic
014 * configuration there is no limit by creating custom {@link PatternCompiler}.
015 * <p>
016 * This class is also a configurator for easy programmatic registration with
017 * {@link LogConfig.Builder#configurator(Configurator)}.
018 *
019 * @see PatternCompiler
020 *
021 */
022public sealed interface PatternConfig extends Configurator {
023
024        /**
025         * Formatter properties prefix
026         */
027        public static final String PATTERN_CONFIG_PREFIX = LogProperties.ROOT_PREFIX + "pattern.config.{name}.";
028
029        /**
030         * Default zoneId if not specified.
031         * @return zone id.
032         */
033        public ZoneId zoneId();
034
035        /**
036         * Line separator for %n by default uses {@link System#lineSeparator()}.
037         * @return line separator.
038         */
039        public String lineSeparator();
040
041        /**
042         * Whether or not print escape outputs. If true than the color patterns will not
043         * decorate.
044         * @return false if ANSI escape sequences can be outputted.
045         */
046        public boolean ansiDisabled();
047
048        /**
049         * Creates a builder to create formatter config.
050         * @return builder.
051         * @apiNote {@link PatternConfig} implements {@link Configurator} so it can be
052         * registered at config time easily.
053         */
054        public static PatternConfigBuilder builder() {
055                return builder(LogProperties.DEFAULT_NAME);
056        }
057
058        /**
059         * Creates a builder to create formatter config.
060         * @param name for property resolution: {@value #PATTERN_CONFIG_PREFIX}.
061         * @return builder.
062         * @apiNote {@link PatternConfig} implements {@link Configurator} so it can be
063         * registered at config time easily.
064         */
065        public static PatternConfigBuilder builder(String name) {
066                return new PatternConfigBuilder(name);
067        }
068
069        /**
070         * Copies the config to builder.
071         * @param builder to receive properties.
072         * @param config to copy from.
073         * @return builder passed in.
074         */
075        public static PatternConfigBuilder copy(PatternConfigBuilder builder, PatternConfig config) {
076                builder.ansiDisabled(config.ansiDisabled());
077                builder.lineSeparator(config.lineSeparator());
078                builder.zoneId(config.zoneId());
079                return builder;
080        }
081
082        /**
083         * Default config.
084         * @return default config.
085         */
086        public static PatternConfig of() {
087                return StandardFormatterConfig.DEFAULT_FORMATTER_CONFIG;
088        }
089
090        /**
091         * Platform independent formatter config that will not change across timezones or
092         * platforms. <strong>The zoneId is UTC, line separator is LF, and ansi is
093         * disabled.</strong>
094         * @return config.
095         */
096        public static PatternConfig ofUniversal() {
097                return StandardFormatterConfig.UNIVERSAL_FORMATTER_CONFIG;
098        }
099
100        @Override
101        default boolean configure(LogConfig config, Pass pass) {
102                config.serviceRegistry().put(PatternConfig.class, ServiceRegistry.DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME, this);
103                return true;
104        }
105
106}
107
108non-sealed interface DefaultFormatterConfig extends PatternConfig {
109
110        /**
111         * Default zoneId if not specified. If not overridden the system default will be used.
112         * @return zone id.
113         */
114        default ZoneId zoneId() {
115                return ZoneId.systemDefault();
116        }
117
118        /**
119         * Line separator for %n by default uses {@link System#lineSeparator()}.
120         * @return line separator.
121         */
122        default String lineSeparator() {
123                return System.lineSeparator();
124        }
125
126        /**
127         * Whether or not print escape outputs. If true than the color patterns will not
128         * decorate.
129         * @return false if ANSI escape sequences can be outputted.
130         */
131        default boolean ansiDisabled() {
132                return false;
133        }
134
135}
136
137enum StandardFormatterConfig implements DefaultFormatterConfig {
138
139        DEFAULT_FORMATTER_CONFIG(), UNIVERSAL_FORMATTER_CONFIG {
140                @Override
141                public String lineSeparator() {
142                        return "\n";
143                }
144
145                @Override
146                public ZoneId zoneId() {
147                        return ZoneId.from(ZoneOffset.UTC);
148                }
149
150                @Override
151                public boolean ansiDisabled() {
152                        return true;
153                }
154        };
155
156}
157
158record SimpleFormatterConfig(ZoneId zoneId, String lineSeparator, boolean ansiDisabled) implements PatternConfig {
159
160}
